label: Feature-6
title: change the ui navigation to be based on the _ path and be a full URL based
description:
we can make this work for only the main index.html page where we configure all request under particular path to be sent to the client

this could work , where this

http://192.168.0.165:10051/console/v0/v0.1/v0.1.6/*

always returns the ./index.html file

but we need to make sure that static files are also not impacted by this

the idea is to allow paths like

http://192.168.0.165:10051/console/v0/v0.1/v0.1.6/issues/Feature-1/Bug-12
